A4.text: Vick signed a one-year contract with the Philadelphia Eagles on August 13, 2009.

A5.text: After serving his sentence, Vick signed with the Philadelphia Eagles for the 2009 season.

A6.text: Entering the 2009 season, the Eagles signed quarterback Michael Vick.
